ygData.msgSnippet: NO no no.. the person who sent the virus file is 15, not the guy who wrote previously.
ygData.messageBody:
NO no no.. the person who sent the virus file is 15, not the guy who wrote
previously.

>From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>

>Even if he is 15, he knows what he's talking about. You can't get it
